message: All metadata fields for the indicator 4-4-2, translated into en
data: Goal 4. Ensure equitable, inclusive and quality education and lifelong learning opportunities for all4.4 By 2030, significantly increase the number of young people and adults with the skills, including technical and vocational skills, necessary for employment, decent work and entrepreneurship4.4.2. % of 10th year leavers enrolled in vocational training centers (public and private)Proportion of students entering Vocational Training Centers compared to all students having completed the 9th%Ratio between students entering Vocational Training Centers and all students having completed 9th grade, multiplied by 100.Not available
